Package com.csse3200.game.entities.configs

Class HeroConfig

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.entities.configs.BaseEntityConfig
com.csse3200.game.entities.configs.HeroConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
EngineerConfig, HeroConfig2, HeroConfig3, SamuraiConfig
public class HeroConfig extends BaseEntityConfig
Configuration class for the hero entity.

Extends BaseEntityConfig, which already provides common fields such as health and baseAttack. This class adds hero-specific attributes such as movement speed, attack cooldown, projectile properties, and texture paths. Values can be loaded from JSON via FileLoader.

  • Constructor Details

    • HeroConfig

      public HeroConfig()
      Default constructor.

      By default, BaseEntityConfig provides: health = 1, baseAttack = 0. Here we override with more appropriate hero starting values.
